meanings.definition: Happening or done at an inappropriate time.
meanings.sent1: The untimely rain ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent2: Her untimely arrival at the party caused a stir.
meanings.sent3: It was untimely for the alarm clock to go off during his nap.
meanings.sent4: The untimely announcement of the test results caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent5: The untimely chirping of the birds woke him up too early.

meanings.definition: Premature or occurring before the expected time.
meanings.sent1: The untimely blooming of the flowers surprised us all.
meanings.sent2: His untimely decision to leave the meeting raised eyebrows.
meanings.sent3: It was untimely for the cake to be taken out of the oven too soon.
meanings.sent4: The untimely arrival of the package made her day.
meanings.sent5: The untimely melting of the ice cream left a sticky mess.

meanings.sent1: The untimely joke during the serious meeting was inappropriate.
meanings.sent2: Their untimely departure left the party feeling empty.
meanings.sent3: It was untimely for the fire alarm to go off during the movie.
meanings.sent4: The untimely power outage disrupted the important presentation.
meanings.sent5: The untimely arrival of the bus made her late for work.
